name: DLL Load By System Process From Suspicious Locations
description: Detects when a system process (ie located in system32, syswow64...etc) loads a DLL from a suspicious location such as %temp%
query: ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\.*/ AND file.path:(/.*\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]\\.*/)) AND (NOT (process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR file.path:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\.*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\* AND file.path:(*\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Downloads\\* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\PerfLogs\\*)) AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\msiexec.exe OR file.path:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*))))`
